parameter.name: topicName
parameter.description: The name of the Pulsar topic to which messages will be published.

parameter.name: compressionType
parameter.description: The compression type to use for messages. Supported values: NONE, LZ4, ZLIB, ZSTD, SNAPPY.

parameter.name: sendMode
parameter.description: The mode for sending the message: SYNC (wait for ack) or ASYNC (send and continue).

parameter.name: batchingEnabled
parameter.description: Whether message batching is enabled for the producer. Batching can improve throughput by sending multiple messages in a single request.

parameter.name: batchingMaxMessages
parameter.description: The maximum number of messages permitted in a batch.

parameter.name: batchingMaxBytes
parameter.description: The maximum size of a batch in bytes.

parameter.name: batchingMaxPublishDelayMicros
parameter.description: The maximum delay in microseconds for batching messages before they are published.

parameter.name: chunkingEnabled
parameter.description: Whether chunking is enabled for large messages. If enabled, large messages are split into smaller chunks.

parameter.name: chunkMaxMessageSize
parameter.description: The maximum size (in bytes) of a single message before it gets chunked.

parameter.name: sendTimeoutMs
parameter.description: The timeout in milliseconds for a message to be sent. If the message is not acknowledged within this time, it is marked as failed.

parameter.name: blockIfQueueFull
parameter.description: Whether the producer should block when the outgoing message queue is full. If false, send operations will fail immediately when the queue is full.

parameter.name: maxPendingMessages
parameter.description: The maximum number of messages allowed to be pending in the outgoing queue.

parameter.name: maxPendingMessagesAcrossPartitions
parameter.description: The maximum number of pending messages across all partitions. This is useful for partitioned topics.

parameter.name: hashingScheme
parameter.description: The hashing scheme used to determine the partition for a message. Supported values: JavaStringHash, Murmur3_32Hash, BoostHash.

parameter.name: messageRoutingMode
parameter.description: The message routing mode for partitioned topics. Supported values: SinglePartition, RoundRobinPartition, CustomPartition.

parameter.name: key
parameter.description: The key associated with the message for partitioning or routing.

parameter.name: value
parameter.description: The value or payload of the message to be published.

parameter.name: properties
parameter.description: Custom properties to attach to the message as key-value pairs.

parameter.name: sequenceId
parameter.description: The sequence ID to assign to the message for deduplication or ordering.

parameter.name: deliverAfter
parameter.description: The delay duration after which the message should be delivered (e.g., 5s, 1m).

parameter.name: responseVariable
parameter.description: The name of the variable to which the output should be stored.

parameter.name: overwriteBody
parameter.description: Replace the Message Body in Message Context with the response of the operation.
